channel.title: A message for all humanity
channel.description:
[quote="RandQm"][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=531743.msg3885698#msg3885698 date=1326414648] [quote author=ox random xi link=topic=531743.msg3885696#msg3885696 date=1326414571] [quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=531743.msg3885689#msg3885689 date=1326414439] I saw this a month ago, on a different video. I can vouch it's not a "screamer", and it's actually really inspiring. [/quote] They're too stupid. [/quote]
Put it back up, don't let a few paranoid people shut your thread down. [/quote][/quote] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CsgaFKwUA6g[/youtube]
If you bitch about [quote="Andrew Ferguson"]"Use Ear/Head Phones for the Best Quality."[/quote] I'll flip out.

indeed it gave me chills[/quote]

item.title: A message for all humanity
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:9, topic:429050”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=531743.msg3885685#msg3885685 date=1326414321]
I think I might watch this, alittle later
Comments:
who﻿ the fuck dislikes this?!
37NaoTo37 1 hour ago
Search for “Universal Brotherhood - The Unity﻿ of Us All” on facebook.
TheFallenPrimordial 2 hours ago
Nice job!﻿
dejwwiz 4 hours ago
Reply
@tradgedyandhope It says 109,677 right now. Youtube’s view counter stinks. And who the hell would dislike this?! This video is GREAT! The best﻿ I have ever seen on this entire website.
jroof2666 5 hours ago
Charlie Chaplin, one of my favorite comedians in history, making the greatest speech in history. I wish those monster would take this to heart﻿ and see the faults they made. The problems they have caused. But they won’t. Thank you. I’m favoring this video.
jroof2666 5 hours ago
One of the best, most powerful speeches I’ve ever heard! I can watch this over and over, and get inspired and moved every time. This is a great message of realization that we should all consider!﻿
rachm1991 7 hours ago 2
Wow this just hit me i’m sharing this video… such strong words with such power and very felt everyone should﻿ share this!
esthertiran 11 hours ago
HOLY. FUCKING. SHIT. that was epic.﻿ i have goosebumps
KJA70 15 hours ago 2
I replay﻿ and replay and replay and I get goosebumps every time.
[/quote]
Does that sound like a creepy video?[/quote]
i said I will watch this later

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:4, topic:429050”]Wow, you guys really think it’s a creepy video? Watch it, it’s inspiring. I’m not fucking around.

Edit; if you’re to fucking stupid to believe anything, fast-forward a few and look for anything to pop out.[/quote]
You seem kinda cranky for this being just a good faith video. Just saying.
